channel.title: Extension on Chrome Extension&Theme
channel.description: Recent content in Extension on Chrome Extension&Theme

item.title: Chatgpt Voice Assistant
item.description: The ChatGPT voice assistant can communicate with ChatGPT just like a human!

item.title: JSON Formatter
item.description: JSON Formatter is a Chrome extension that formats JSON data within the browser.

item.title: CSDN Unlocker
item.description: CSDN Unlocker is a Chrome extension that help you view or copy article without login.

item.title: OmniDebugger
item.description: OmniDebugger is a powerful Chrome extension tool designed to help you debug any page on your browser.

item.title: Douyin for Desktop
item.description: Experience Douyin for desktop like never before: Chrome extension that brings exciting and creative content to your screen

item.title: Website Blocker
item.description: Block specified websites and schedule unblocking.

item.title: Show Api Name
item.description: Show Salesforce Field's API Names On The Detail Page.

item.title: Change Google Calendar Background
item.description: Customize The Background Of Google Calendar.

item.title: Password Generator
item.description: Password generator and check the strength of password.

item.title: Image Converter
item.description: The tool to convert between different image formats (JPEG, PNG, GIF, etc.) and change image size.

item.title: Xiaohongshu for Desktop
item.description: Experience Xiaohongshu for desktop like never before: Chrome extension that brings exciting and creative content to your screen

item.title: 2048 - Classic Games
item.description: Play 2048 Game Online. Play 2048 Game Offline. Join the numbers and get to the 2048 tile!

item.title: Family Computer Games
item.description: “Family Computer Games” is an FC game simulator that can run in a browser and has FC games built-in.

item.title: Mute Tabs
item.description: Extension tool to mute Chrome browser tabs.

item.title: Night Mode Shift
item.description: All websites in the current window can be switched to night mode with just one click, and colors and their depth can be specified.

item.title: Tab To Popup Window
item.description: Tab To Popup Window is a Chrome extension that allows users to quickly convert the current tab into a standalone popup window.
